short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to YouTube videos that toggles a full-window player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension for a better YouTube viewing experience.
